verses.verse: <S%H1984>Praise<s%> the <S%H3050>Lord!<s%> I will <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> [my] <S%H3824>heart,<s%> In the <S%H5475>company<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> and in the <S%H5712>assembly.<s%>
<S%H1419>Great<s%> are the <S%H4639>works<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> [They are] <S%H1875>studied<s%> by <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H2655>delight<s%> in them.
He has <S%H6213>made<s%> His <S%H6381>wonders<s%> to be <S%H2143>remembered;<s%> The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H2587>gracious<s%> and <S%H7349>compassionate.<s%>
He has <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H2964>food<s%> to those who <S%H3372>fear<s%> Him; He will <S%H2142>remember<s%> His <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

He has <S%H5046>made<s%> <S%H5046>known<s%> to His <S%H5971>people<s%> the <S%H3581>power<s%> of His <S%H4639>works,<s%> In <S%H5414>giving<s%> them the <S%H5159>heritage<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
The <S%H4639>works<s%> of His <S%H3027>hands<s%> are <S%H571>truth<s%> and <S%H4941>justice;<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> His <S%H6490>precepts<s%> are <S%H539>sure.<s%>
They are <S%H5564>upheld<s%> <S%H5703>forever<s%> and <S%H5769>ever;<s%> They are <S%H6213>performed<s%> in <S%H571>truth<s%> and <S%H3477>uprightness.<s%>

He has <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H6304>redemption<s%> to His <S%H5971>people;<s%> He has <S%H6680>ordained<s%> His <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H5769>forever;<s%> <S%H6918>Holy<s%> and <S%H3372>awesome<s%> is His <S%H8034>name.<s%>

The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom;<s%> A <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7922>understanding<s%> have <S%H3605>all<s%> those who <S%H6213>do<s%> [His commandments]; His <S%H8416>praise<s%> <S%H5975>endures<s%> <S%H5703>forever.<s%>
